sentences.en: ...the present fashion for intuitive, expressive painting.
sentences.cn: …当前凭直觉的、富于表现力的绘画风尚。

sentences.en: Apparently the expressive sound of human feeling recalled the poor girl from the stupor of fear.
sentences.cn: 这阵富于感情的声音显然使可怜的女郎从恍恍惚惚的惊恐状态中惊醒.

sentences.en: He dropped my hand and covered Gatsby with his expressive nose.
sentences.cn: 他放下了我的手,把他那只富有表情的鼻子对准了盖茨比.

sentences.en: Her companion was of lower stature, with lightbrown hair and expressive blue eyes.
sentences.cn: 她的女伴身体稍矮, 头发淡褐色,富于表情有双蓝眼睛.

sentences.en: Her face grew momently darker , more dissatisfied and more sourly expressive of disappointment.
sentences.cn: 她的脸色越来越阴沉,越来越沮丧, 越来越愠怒地表示出失望.

sentences.en: I acted out a pantomine more eloquent than my most expressive words.
sentences.cn: 我扮演的哑剧比我最富表现力的语言还要意味深长.

sentences.en: Its history is expressive of the character and development of the people who possess it.
sentences.cn: 它的历史体现了其拥有者的性格特征和发展过程。

sentences.en: Perhaps all his poems were really love poems, expressive of love for someone.
sentences.cn: 也许他所有的诗歌其实都是爱情诗，表现了对某个人的爱。

sentences.en: Robyn had the more mobile, more expressive face.
sentences.cn: 罗宾有一张更加善变、表情更加丰富的脸。
她有一双极富表情的眼睛。

sentences.en: Sun's novels made outstanding achievements in expressive art and individual aesthetic style.
sentences.cn: 孙犁在小说的抒情艺术和个人美学风格的独创上,取得了突出的成就.

sentences.en: The face was not at all insipid, but it was not exactly expressive.
sentences.cn: 这张脸当然不能说缺少吸引力, 然而又不是那么富于表情.

sentences.en: The Jew nodded an expressive approval of this mode of treatment.
sentences.cn: 老犹太点点头表示赞成采用这种疗法.

sentences.en: These paintings can't compete in expressive power with those ones.
sentences.cn: 这些水彩画在表达能力方面比不上那些.

sentences.en: Unfortunately this expressive word has not yet made its way across the channel.
sentences.cn: 不幸的是,这个富有表现力的词尚未越过海峡传过来.

sentences.en: You can train people to be more expressive.
sentences.cn: 可以训练人们使其更具表现力。

words.tran_cn: 表现地；意味深长地；表示地
快车，快递，专使；捷运公司
表达，表示；表情；表现力；措辞

trans.tran_en: If you describe a person or their behaviour as expressive, you mean that their behaviour clearly indicates their feelings or intentions
